## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (5b6cbb698b61db16bda42e96c5df7c9095bbc4f203d776cd4cbac77e6906c4d8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'canvaskit-local' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
